properties.name: axon.axonserver.client-id
properties.description: clientId as it registers itself to AxonServer, must be unique

properties.name: axon.axonserver.component-name
properties.description: application name, defaults to spring.application.name multiple instances of the same application share the same application name, but each must have a different clientId

properties.name: axon.axonserver.context
properties.description: Bounded context that this application operates in

properties.name: axon.axonserver.initial-nr-of-permits
properties.description: Initial number of permits send for message streams (events, commands, queries)

properties.name: axon.axonserver.keep-alive-time
properties.description: Interval (in ms) for keep alive requests, 0 is keep-alive disabled

properties.name: axon.axonserver.keep-alive-timeout
properties.description: Timeout (in ms) for keep alive requests

properties.name: axon.axonserver.max-message-size
properties.description: GRPC max inbound message size, 0 keeps default value

properties.name: axon.axonserver.new-permits-threshold
properties.description: Threshold at which application sends new permits to server

properties.name: axon.axonserver.nr-of-new-permits
properties.description: Additional number of permits send for message streams (events, commands, queries) when application is ready for more messages

properties.name: axon.axonserver.processors-notification-initial-delay
properties.description: Initial delay (in ms.) before application sends first status update on event processors to AxonServer

properties.name: axon.axonserver.processors-notification-rate
properties.description: Interval (in ms.) application sends status updates on event processors to AxonServer

properties.name: axon.axonserver.servers
properties.description: Comma separated list of AxonDB servers. Each element is hostname or hostname:grpcPort. When no grpcPort is specified, default port 8123 is used.

properties.name: axon.axonserver.ssl-enabled
properties.description: Use TLS for connection to AxonServer

properties.name: axon.axonserver.suppress-download-message
properties.description: Indicates whether the download advice message should be suppressed, even when default connection properties (which are generally only used in DEV mode) are used. Defaults to false.
